verses.verse: וְאֵ֤לֶּה <S%H428><s%> now these הַגּוֹיִם֙ <S%H1471><s%> Now these [are] the nations אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which הִנִּ֣יחַ <S%H3240><s%> left יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD לְנַסּ֥וֹת <S%H5254><s%> to prove בָּ֖ם אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> had not יָדְע֔וּ <S%H3045><s%> by them [even] as many [of Israel] as had not known אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> any מִלְחֲמ֥וֹת <S%H4421><s%> all the wars כְּנָֽעַן׃ <S%H3667><s%> of Canaan

רַ֗ק <S%H7535><s%> Only that לְמַ֙עַן֙ <S%H4616><s%> order דַּ֚עַת <S%H1847><s%> cunning דֹּר֣וֹת <S%H1755><s%> the generations בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לְלַמְּדָ֖ם <S%H3925><s%> to teach מִלְחָמָ֑ה <S%H4421><s%> them war רַ֥ק <S%H7535><s%> but אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who לְפָנִ֖ים <S%H6440><s%> at the least such as before לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> had not יְדָעֽוּם׃ <S%H3045><s%> might know

חֲמֵ֣שֶׁת ׀ <S%H2568><s%> [Namely] five סַרְנֵ֣י <S%H5633><s%> lords פְלִשְׁתִּ֗ים <S%H6430><s%> of the Philistines וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הַֽכְּנַעֲנִי֙ <S%H3669><s%> and all the Canaanites וְהַצִּ֣ידֹנִ֔י <S%H6722><s%> and the Sidonians וְהַ֣חִוִּ֔י <S%H2340><s%> and the Hivites יֹשֵׁ֖ב <S%H3427><s%> that dwelt הַ֣ר <S%H2022><s%> in mount הַלְּבָנ֑וֹן <S%H3844><s%> Lebanon מֵהַר֙ <S%H2022><s%> from mount בַּ֣עַל חֶרְמ֔וֹן <S%H1179><s%> Baalhermon עַ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> far לְב֥וֹא <S%H935><s%> unto the entering in חֲמָֽת׃ <S%H2574><s%> of Hamath

וַֽיִּהְי֕וּ <S%H1961><s%> were for לְנַסּ֥וֹת <S%H5254><s%> And they were to prove בָּ֖ם אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel לָדַ֗עַת <S%H3045><s%> by them to know הֲיִשְׁמְעוּ֙ <S%H8085><s%> whether they would hearken אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִצְוֹ֣ת <S%H4687><s%> unto the commandments יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which צִוָּ֥ה <S%H6680><s%> which he commanded אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲבוֹתָ֖ם <S%H1><s%> their fathers בְּיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> by the hand מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <S%H4872><s%> of Moses

וּבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel יָשְׁב֖וּ <S%H3427><s%> dwelt בְּקֶ֣רֶב <S%H7130><s%> among הַֽכְּנַעֲנִ֑י <S%H3669><s%> the Canaanites הַחִתִּ֤י <S%H2850><s%> Hittites וְהָֽאֱמֹרִי֙ <S%H567><s%> and Amorites וְהַפְּרִזִּ֔י <S%H6522><s%> and Perizzites וְהַחִוִּ֖י <S%H2340><s%> and Hivites וְהַיְבוּסִֽי׃ <S%H2983><s%> and Jebusites

וַיִּקְח֨וּ <S%H3947><s%> And they took אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנוֹתֵיהֶ֤ם <S%H1323><s%> their daughters לָהֶם֙ <S%H1992><s%> as לְנָשִׁ֔ים <S%H802><s%> to be their wives וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנוֹתֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H1323><s%> their daughters נָתְנ֣וּ <S%H5414><s%> and gave לִבְנֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H1121><s%> to their sons וַיַּעַבְד֖וּ <S%H5647><s%> and served אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֱלֹהֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H430><s%> their gods פ

וַיַּעֲשׂ֨וּ <S%H6213><s%> did בְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֤ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָרַע֙ <S%H7451><s%> evil בְּעֵינֵ֣י <S%H5869><s%> in the sight יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וַֽיִּשְׁכְּח֖וּ <S%H7911><s%> and forgat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹֽהֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H430><s%> their God וַיַּעַבְד֥וּ <S%H5647><s%> and served אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַבְּעָלִ֖ים <S%H1168><s%> Baalim וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאֲשֵׁרֽוֹת׃ <S%H842><s%> and the groves

וַיִּֽחַר־ <S%H2734><s%> was hot אַ֤ף <S%H639><s%> Therefore the anger יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> against Israel וַֽיִּמְכְּרֵ֗ם <S%H4376><s%> and he sold בְּיַד֙ <S%H3027><s%> them into the hand כּוּשַׁ֣ן רִשְׁעָתַ֔יִם <S%H3573><s%> of Chushanrishathaim מֶ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king אֲרַ֣ם נַהֲרָ֑יִם <S%H763><s%> of Mesopotamia וַיַּעַבְד֧וּ <S%H5647><s%> served בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> and the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כּוּשַׁ֥ן רִשְׁעָתַ֖יִם <S%H3573><s%> Chushanrishathaim שְׁמֹנֶ֥ה <S%H8083><s%> eight שָׁנִֽים׃ <S%H8141><s%> years

וַיִּזְעֲק֤וּ <S%H2199><s%> cried בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> And when the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD וַיָּ֨קֶם <S%H6965><s%> raised up יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD מוֹשִׁ֛יעַ <S%H3467><s%> a deliverer לִבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> to the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וַיּֽוֹשִׁיעֵ֑ם <S%H3467><s%> who delivered אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> עָתְנִיאֵ֣ל <S%H6274><s%> them [even] Othniel בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son קְנַ֔ז <S%H7073><s%> of Kenaz אֲחִ֥י <S%H251><s%> brother כָלֵ֖ב <S%H3612><s%> Caleb's הַקָּטֹ֥ן <S%H6996><s%> younger מִמֶּֽנּוּ׃ <S%H4480><s%> at

וַתְּהִ֨י <S%H1961><s%> came עָלָ֥יו <S%H5921><s%> over רֽוּחַ־ <S%H7307><s%> And the Spirit יְהוָה֮ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וַיִּשְׁפֹּ֣ט <S%H8199><s%> came upon him and he judged אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יִשְׂרָאֵל֒ <S%H3478><s%> Israel וַיֵּצֵא֙ <S%H3318><s%> and went out לַמִּלְחָמָ֔ה <S%H4421><s%> to war וַיִּתֵּ֤ן <S%H5414><s%> delivered יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> and the LORD בְּיָד֔וֹ <S%H3027><s%> into his hand אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כּוּשַׁ֥ן רִשְׁעָתַ֖יִם <S%H3573><s%> Chushanrishathaim מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king אֲרָ֑ם <S%H758><s%> Aram וַתָּ֣עָז <S%H5810><s%> prevailed יָד֔וֹ <S%H3027><s%> and his hand עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> over כּוּשַׁ֥ן רִשְׁעָתָֽיִם׃ <S%H3573><s%> against Chushanrishathaim

וַתִּשְׁקֹ֥ט <S%H8252><s%> had rest הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> And the land אַרְבָּעִ֣ים <S%H705><s%> forty שָׁנָ֑ה <S%H8141><s%> years וַיָּ֖מָת <S%H4191><s%> died עָתְנִיאֵ֥ל <S%H6274><s%> And Othniel בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son קְנַֽז׃ <S%H7073><s%> of Kenaz פ

וַיֹּסִ֙פוּ֙ <S%H3254><s%> again בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <S%H6213><s%> did הָרַ֖ע <S%H7451><s%> evil בְּעֵינֵ֣י <S%H5869><s%> in the sight יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וַיְחַזֵּ֨ק <S%H2388><s%> strengthened יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> and the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֶגְל֤וֹן <S%H5700><s%> Eglon מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> the king מוֹאָב֙ <S%H4124><s%> of Moab עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> against Israel עַ֛ל <S%H5921><s%> against כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for עָשׂ֥וּ <S%H6213><s%> because they had done אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָרַ֖ע <S%H7451><s%> evil בְּעֵינֵ֥י <S%H5869><s%> in the sight יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

וַיֶּאֱסֹ֣ף <S%H622><s%> And he gathered אֵלָ֔יו <S%H413><s%> about אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> unto him the children עַמּ֖וֹן <S%H5983><s%> of Ammon וַעֲמָלֵ֑ק <S%H6002><s%> and Amalek וַיֵּ֗לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> went וַיַּךְ֙ <S%H5221><s%> and smote אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel וַיִּֽירְשׁ֖וּ <S%H3423><s%> and possessed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עִ֥יר <S%H5892><s%> the city הַתְּמָרִֽים׃ <S%H8558><s%> of the palm

וַיַּעַבְד֤וּ <S%H5647><s%> served בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> So the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֶגְל֣וֹן <S%H5700><s%> Eglon מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> the king מוֹאָ֔ב <S%H4124><s%> of Moab שְׁמוֹנֶ֥ה <S%H8083><s%> eight עֶשְׂרֵ֖ה <S%H6240><s%> teen שָׁנָֽה׃ <S%H8141><s%> years ס

וַיִּזְעֲק֣וּ <S%H2199><s%> cried בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> But when the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֮ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוָה֒ <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD וַיָּקֶם֩ <S%H6965><s%> raised them up יְהוָ֨ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD לָהֶ֜ם מוֹשִׁ֗יעַ <S%H3467><s%> a deliverer אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֵה֤וּד <S%H164><s%> Ehud בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son גֵּרָא֙ <S%H1617><s%> of Gera בֶּן־ הַיְמִינִ֔י <S%H1145><s%> a Benjamite אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> a man אִטֵּ֖ר <S%H334><s%> left יַד־ <S%H3027><s%> and by him יְמִינ֑וֹ <S%H3225><s%> left-handed וַיִּשְׁלְח֨וּ <S%H7971><s%> sent בְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֤ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel בְּיָדוֹ֙ <S%H3027><s%> able מִנְחָ֔ה <S%H4503><s%> a present לְעֶגְל֖וֹן <S%H5700><s%> unto Eglon מֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king מוֹאָֽב׃ <S%H4124><s%> of Moab

וַיַּעַשׂ֩ <S%H6213><s%> made ל֨וֹ אֵה֜וּד <S%H164><s%> But Ehud חֶ֗רֶב <S%H2719><s%> him a dagger וְלָ֛הּ שְׁנֵ֥י <S%H8147><s%> which had two פֵי֖וֹת <S%H6366><s%> edges גֹּ֣מֶד <S%H1574><s%> of a cubit אָרְכָּ֑הּ <S%H753><s%> length וַיַּחְגֹּ֤ר <S%H2296><s%> and he did gird אוֹתָהּ֙ <S%H853><s%> מִתַּ֣חַת <S%H8478><s%> under לְמַדָּ֔יו <S%H4055><s%> it under his raiment עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> and יֶ֥רֶךְ <S%H3409><s%> thigh יְמִינֽוֹ׃ <S%H3225><s%> upon his right

וַיַּקְרֵב֙ <S%H7126><s%> And he brought אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמִּנְחָ֔ה <S%H4503><s%> the present לְעֶגְל֖וֹן <S%H5700><s%> unto Eglon מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king מוֹאָ֑ב <S%H4124><s%> of Moab וְעֶגְל֕וֹן <S%H5700><s%> and Eglon אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> man בָּרִ֖יא <S%H1277><s%> fat מְאֹֽד׃ <S%H3966><s%> [was] a very

וַֽיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> came כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> he כִּלָּ֔ה <S%H3615><s%> And when he had made an end לְהַקְרִ֖יב <S%H7126><s%> to offer אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמִּנְחָ֑ה <S%H4503><s%> the present וַיְשַׁלַּח֙ <S%H7971><s%> he sent away אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> the people נֹשְׂאֵ֖י <S%H5375><s%> that bare הַמִּנְחָֽה׃ <S%H4503><s%> the present

וְה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> himself שָׁ֗ב <S%H7725><s%> But he himself turned again מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַפְּסִילִים֙ <S%H6456><s%> from the quarries אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> were at הַגִּלְגָּ֔ל <S%H1537><s%> that [were] by Gilgal וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said דְּבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> errand סֵ֥תֶר <S%H5643><s%> I have a secret לִ֛י אֵלֶ֖יךָ <S%H413><s%> for הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> unto thee O king וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> who said הָ֔ס <S%H2013><s%> Keep silence וַיֵּֽצְאוּ֙ <S%H3318><s%> by him went out מֵֽעָלָ֔יו <S%H5921><s%> and כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הָעֹמְדִ֖ים <S%H5975><s%> And all that stood עָלָֽיו׃ <S%H5921><s%> and

וְאֵה֣וּד ׀ <S%H164><s%> And Ehud בָּ֣א <S%H935><s%> came אֵלָ֗יו <S%H413><s%> about וְהֽוּא־ <S%H1931><s%> he יֹ֠שֵׁב <S%H3427><s%> unto him and he was sitting בַּעֲלִיַּ֨ת <S%H5944><s%> parlour הַמְּקֵרָ֤ה <S%H4747><s%> in a summer אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after לוֹ֙ לְבַדּ֔וֹ <S%H905><s%> alone וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אֵה֔וּד <S%H164><s%> which he had for himself alone And Ehud דְּבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> I have a message אֱלֹהִ֥ים <S%H430><s%> from God לִ֖י אֵלֶ֑יךָ <S%H413><s%> for וַיָּ֖קָם <S%H6965><s%> unto thee And he arose מֵעַ֥ל <S%H5921><s%> from הַכִּסֵּֽא׃ <S%H3678><s%> out of [his] seat

וַיִּשְׁלַ֤ח <S%H7971><s%> put forth אֵהוּד֙ <S%H164><s%> And Ehud אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יַ֣ד <S%H3027><s%> hand שְׂמֹאל֔וֹ <S%H8040><s%> his left וַיִּקַּח֙ <S%H3947><s%> and took אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַחֶ֔רֶב <S%H2719><s%> the dagger מֵעַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> and יֶ֣רֶךְ <S%H3409><s%> thigh יְמִינ֑וֹ <S%H3225><s%> from his right וַיִּתְקָעֶ֖הָ <S%H8628><s%> and thrust בְּבִטְנֽוֹ׃ <S%H990><s%> it into his belly

וַיָּבֹ֨א <S%H935><s%> also went in גַֽם־ <S%H1571><s%> also הַנִּצָּ֜ב <S%H5325><s%> And the haft אַחַ֣ר <S%H310><s%> after הַלַּ֗הַב <S%H3851><s%> the blade וַיִּסְגֹּ֤ר <S%H5462><s%> closed הַחֵ֙לֶב֙ <S%H2459><s%> and the fat בְּעַ֣ד <S%H1157><s%> upon הַלַּ֔הַב <S%H3851><s%> the blade כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> did not שָׁלַ֛ף <S%H8025><s%> so that he could not draw הַחֶ֖רֶב <S%H2719><s%> the dagger מִבִּטְנ֑וֹ <S%H990><s%> out of his belly וַיֵּצֵ֖א <S%H3318><s%> came out הַֽפַּרְשְׁדֹֽנָה׃ <S%H6574><s%> and the dirt

וַיֵּצֵ֥א <S%H3318><s%> went forth אֵה֖וּד <S%H164><s%> Then Ehud הַֽמִּסְדְּר֑וֹנָה <S%H4528><s%> through the porch וַיִּסְגֹּ֞ר <S%H5462><s%> and shut דַּלְת֧וֹת <S%H1817><s%> the doors הָעַלִיָּ֛ה <S%H5944><s%> of the parlour בַּעֲד֖וֹ <S%H5774><s%> brandish וְנָעָֽל׃ <S%H5274><s%> upon him and locked

וְה֤וּא <S%H1931><s%> he יָצָא֙ <S%H3318><s%> When he was gone out וַעֲבָדָ֣יו <S%H5650><s%> his servants בָּ֔אוּ <S%H935><s%> came וַיִּרְא֕וּ <S%H7200><s%> and when they saw וְהִנֵּ֛ה <S%H2009><s%> and behold דַּלְת֥וֹת <S%H1817><s%> that behold the doors הָעֲלִיָּ֖ה <S%H5944><s%> of the parlour נְעֻל֑וֹת <S%H5274><s%> [were] locked וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <S%H559><s%> they said אַ֣ךְ <S%H389><s%> is only מֵסִ֥יךְ <S%H5526><s%> Surely he covereth ה֛וּא <S%H1931><s%> he אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רַגְלָ֖יו <S%H7272><s%> his feet בַּחֲדַ֥ר <S%H2315><s%> chamber הַמְּקֵרָֽה׃ <S%H4747><s%> in his summer

וַיָּחִ֣ילוּ <S%H2342><s%> And they tarried עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until בּ֔וֹשׁ <S%H954><s%> till they were ashamed וְהִנֵּ֛ה <S%H2009><s%> behold אֵינֶ֥נּוּ <S%H369><s%> did not פֹתֵ֖חַ <S%H6605><s%> and behold he opened דַּלְת֣וֹת <S%H1817><s%> not the doors הָֽעֲלִיָּ֑ה <S%H5944><s%> of the parlour וַיִּקְח֤וּ <S%H3947><s%> therefore they took אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמַּפְתֵּ֙חַ֙ <S%H4668><s%> a key וַיִּפְתָּ֔חוּ <S%H6605><s%> and opened וְהִנֵּה֙ <S%H2009><s%> and behold אֲדֹ֣נֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H113><s%> [them] and behold their lord נֹפֵ֥ל <S%H5307><s%> [was] fallen down אַ֖רְצָה <S%H776><s%> on the earth מֵֽת׃ <S%H4191><s%> dead

וְאֵה֥וּד <S%H164><s%> And Ehud נִמְלַ֖ט <S%H4422><s%> escaped עַ֣ד <S%H5704><s%> while הִֽתְמַהְמְהָ֑ם <S%H4102><s%> while they tarried וְהוּא֙ <S%H1931><s%> and he עָבַ֣ר <S%H5674><s%> and passed beyond אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַפְּסִילִ֔ים <S%H6456><s%> the quarries וַיִּמָּלֵ֖ט <S%H4422><s%> and escaped הַשְּׂעִירָֽתָה׃ <S%H8167><s%> unto Seirath

וַיְהִ֣י <S%H1961><s%> came בְּבוֹא֔וֹ <S%H935><s%> And it came to pass when he was come וַיִּתְקַ֥ע <S%H8628><s%> that he blew בַּשּׁוֹפָ֖ר <S%H7782><s%> a trumpet בְּהַ֣ר <S%H2022><s%> in the mountain אֶפְרָ֑יִם <S%H669><s%> of Ephraim וַיֵּרְד֨וּ <S%H3381><s%> went down עִמּ֧וֹ <S%H5973><s%> with בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> and the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at הָהָ֖ר <S%H2022><s%> with him from the mount וְה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> and he in לִפְנֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H6440><s%> and he before

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said אֲלֵהֶם֙ <S%H413><s%> to רִדְפ֣וּ <S%H7291><s%> unto them Follow אַחֲרַ֔י <S%H310><s%> after כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for נָתַ֨ן <S%H5414><s%> hath delivered יְהוָ֧ה <S%H3068><s%> me for the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֹיְבֵיכֶ֛ם <S%H341><s%> your enemies אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מוֹאָ֖ב <S%H4124><s%> the Moabites בְּיֶדְכֶ֑ם <S%H3027><s%> into your hand וַיֵּרְד֣וּ <S%H3381><s%> And they went down אַחֲרָ֗יו <S%H310><s%> after וַֽיִּלְכְּד֞וּ <S%H3920><s%> him and took אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מַעְבְּר֤וֹת <S%H4569><s%> the fords הַיַּרְדֵּן֙ <S%H3383><s%> of Jordan לְמוֹאָ֔ב <S%H4124><s%> toward Moab וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> and did not נָתְנ֥וּ <S%H5414><s%> and suffered אִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> not a man לַעֲבֹֽר׃ <S%H5674><s%> to pass over

וַיַּכּ֨וּ <S%H5221><s%> And they slew אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מוֹאָ֜ב <S%H4124><s%> of Moab בָּעֵ֣ת <S%H6256><s%> at that time הַהִ֗יא <S%H1931><s%> he כַּעֲשֶׂ֤רֶת <S%H6235><s%> about ten אֲלָפִים֙ <S%H505><s%> thousand אִ֔ישׁ <S%H376><s%> men כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all שָׁמֵ֖ן <S%H8082><s%> all lusty וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> and all men חָ֑יִל <S%H2428><s%> of valour וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> and no נִמְלַ֖ט <S%H4422><s%> and there escaped אִֽישׁ׃ <S%H376><s%> not a man

וַתִּכָּנַ֤ע <S%H3665><s%> was subdued מוֹאָב֙ <S%H4124><s%> So Moab בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> that day הַה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> he תַּ֖חַת <S%H8478><s%> under יַ֣ד <S%H3027><s%> under the hand יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וַתִּשְׁקֹ֥ט <S%H8252><s%> had rest הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> And the land שְׁמוֹנִ֥ים <S%H8084><s%> fourscore שָׁנָֽה׃ <S%H8141><s%> years ס

וְאַחֲרָ֤יו <S%H310><s%> And after הָיָה֙ <S%H1961><s%> came שַׁמְגַּ֣ר <S%H8044><s%> him was Shamgar בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son עֲנָ֔ת <S%H6067><s%> of Anath וַיַּ֤ךְ <S%H5221><s%> which slew אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פְּלִשְׁתִּים֙ <S%H6430><s%> of the Philistines שֵֽׁשׁ־ <S%H8337><s%> six מֵא֣וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred אִ֔ישׁ <S%H376><s%> men בְּמַלְמַ֖ד <S%H4451><s%> goad הַבָּקָ֑ר <S%H1241><s%> with an ox וַיֹּ֥שַׁע <S%H3467><s%> and he also delivered גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> also ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Israel ס
